title: __How to clear your game cache__
desc:
Follow the follwing steps to clear your game cache: 
 **Close Game** 
 Close FiveM completely 
 **Press keys** 
 Win + R 
 Go to the folder 
 ```/Local/FiveM/FiveM.app/data```
 **Delete the folders** 
 cache, server-cache, server-cache-priv 
 **Restart Game** 
 Restart the game and download the resources again.
